Sinopsis Film 'Ratu Ilmu Hitam', Kala Santet Meneror
07 Nov 2019, 20:43 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


'Ratu Ilmu Hitam' versi baru ditulis oleh Joko Anwar dan disutradarai oleh Kimo Stamboel dan menampilkan teror dari santet. Berikut sinopsisnya. (Dok. Youtube Rapi Films)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Rumah produksi Rapi Films kembali memproduksi ulang film horor klasik setelah Pengabdi Setan (1980). Kali ini mereka memproduksi ulang film Ratu Ilmu Hitam (1981) yang dulu menampilkan aktris Suzzanna Martha Frederika van Osch. Berikut sinopsisnya.Ratu Ilmu Hitam versi baru ditulis oleh Joko Anwar dan disutradarai Kimo Stamboel. Produser Rapi Films, Sunil Samtani, yakin kolaborasi mereka berdua akan menghasilkan film yang berkualitas.Film ini bercerita tentang tiga keluarga yang berkunjung ke panti asuhan di luar kota. Hanif (Ario Bayu) diceritakan mengajak sang istri, Nadya (Hannah Al Rashid), dan ketiga anaknya ke panti asuhan tempat ia pernah dibesarkan.Dua sahabat Hanif saat tinggal di panti asuhan, Anton (Tanta Ginting) dan Jefri (Mikker Khan) turut hadir. Masing-masing membawa istri yang diperankan oleh Imelda Therinne dan Salvita Decorte.Tujuan kedatangan mereka untuk bertemu dengan pengasuh panti, Bandi (Yayu Unru), yang sudah tua dan sakit keras. Mereka berkunjung dengan niat memberikan penghormatan terakhir kepada orang yang mengasuh mereka sejak kecil.Alih-alih bahagia dan nostalgia, malam itu mereka semua malah mengalami berbagai kejadian aneh dan teror. Ada orang berilmu hitam yang memiliki dendam sehingga ingin menyiksa mereka semua hingga mati.Kimo menjanjikan teror dalam film Ratu Ilmu Hitam versi baru, terutama yang berkaitan dengan santet. Bahkan ia dan Joko sampai konsultasi dengan paranormal untuk menggarap film ini.Ia juga memastikan sosok ratu ilmu hitam yang dulu diperankan Suzzanna akan kembali muncul. Namun ia tidak ingin menjelaskan siapa aktris yang memerankan karakter tersebut agar menjadi kejutan yang yang menonton.


Para pemain 'Ratu Ilmu Hitam', Giulio Parengkuan , Salvita Decorte , Hannah Al Rasyid , Zara JKT48 , Ade Firman Hakim. (CNN Indonesia/ Hesti Rika)

Selain itu, dalam film ini ada adegan ikonis Ratu Ilmu hitam versi lama sebagai penghormatan. Salah satunya adalah tubuh tanpa kepala yang masih tetap bisa bergerak, yang mana adegan ini bisa dilihat dalam trailer.Ratu Ilmu Hitam merupakan salah satu film horor legendaris Indonesia. Berbagai adegan sadis mengenai santet dan penampilan Suzzanna sebagai aktris spesialis horor menjadi daya tarik bagi penonton.Pada 1982, Ratu Ilmu Hitam masuk lima nominasi Festival Film Indonesia. Lima nominasi tersebut adalah Pemeran Utama Wanita Terbaik, Pemeran Pendukung Pria Terbaik, Tata Sinematografi Terbaik, Penyuntingan Terbaik dan Tata Artistik Terbaik.Pada masa itu film yang disutradarai Lilik Sudjio ini sudah berhasil menarik perhatian internasional. Ratu Ilmu Hitam tayang di berbagai negara, antara lain di Amerika Serikat dengan judul Queen of Black Magic dan di Prancis dengan judul Exorcisme Noir.Usai mengetahui sinopsis, film 'Ratu Ilmu Hitam' mulai tayang di bioskop pada 7 November 2019.

Synopsis of the film 'Queen of Black Arts', Kala Santet Meneror
Nov 7 2019, 20:43 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The new version of 'Queen of Dark Arts' was written by Joko Anwar and directed by Kimo Stamboel and featured terror from witchcraft. Here is the synopsis. (Doc. Youtube of Rapi Films)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The production house of Rapi Films re-produced the classic horror film after Servant of Satan (1980). This time they reproduced the film Ratu Hitam Hitam (1981) which used to feature actress Suzzanna Martha Frederika van Osch. Here is the synopsis. The new version of the Dark Arts Queen was written by Joko Anwar and directed by Kimo Stamboel. Rapi Films producer, Sunil Samtani, is sure their collaboration will produce quality films. The film tells the story of three families visiting an orphanage outside the city. Hanif (Ario Bayu) is said to invite his wife, Nadya (Hannah Al Rashid), and their three children to an orphanage where he was raised. Two of Hanif's best friends while living in the orphanage, Anton (Tanta Ginting) and Jefri (Mikker Khan) also attended . Each of them brought his wife, played by Imelda Therinne and Salvita Decorte. The purpose of their visit was to meet the caregiver, Bandi (Yayu Unru), who was old and seriously ill. They visited with the intention of paying their last respects to those who nurtured them since childhood. Instead of being happy and nostalgic, that night they all experienced various strange incidents and terror. There are people with black knowledge who have a grudge and want to torture them all to death. Kimo promises terror in the new version of the film Ratu Ratu Hitam, especially those related to witchcraft. He and Joko even consulted with psychics to work on this film. He also ensured the figure of the black magic queen who was played by Suzzanna would reappear. But he did not want to explain who the actress who played the character was in order to be a surprise to those who watched.


The players of the 'Queen of Dark Arts', Giulio Parengkuan, Salvita Decorte, Hannah Al Rasyid, Zara JKT48, Ade Firman Hakim. (CNN Indonesia / Hesti Rika)

In addition, in this film there is an iconic scene of the old version of the black magic Queen as a tribute. One of them is a headless body that can still move, which this scene can be seen in the trailer. Queen of the Dark Arts is one of Indonesia's legendary horror films. Various sadistic scenes about witchcraft and Suzzanna's appearance as a horror specialist actress became an attraction for the audience. In 1982, Ratu Ilmu Hitam was included in five Indonesian Film Festival nominations. The five nominations were Best Female Main Actor, Best Male Supporting Actor, Best Cinematography, Best Editing and Best Artistic Arrangement. At that time the film directed by Lilik Sudjio had managed to attract international attention. The Queen of Black Sciences airs in various countries, including in the United States with the title Queen of Black Magic and in France with the title Exorcisme Noir. After knowing the synopsis, the film 'Queen of Dark Arts' began airing in theaters on November 7, 2019.
